QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: Note: The Configuration class is being deprecated in lieu of using a ConcreteComponent relationship to indicate a hierarchy of Setting or SettingData instances. This association allows the reuse of the element to Setting or SettingData associations instead of defining a peer association specifically for Configurations. Deprecated description: This association relates a Configuration object to one or more ManagedSystemElements. The Configuration object represents a certain behavior or a desired functional state for the associated ManagedSystemElements.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: Note: The use of this element is deprecated. Deprecated description: The ManagedSystemElement.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: Note: The use of this element is deprecated. Deprecated description: The Configuration object that groups the Settings and dependencies that are associated with the ManagedSystemElement.
